statements: DELETE FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_source = 'Factory A' AND emission_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_source = 'Factory' AND emission_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM carbon_offsets WHERE offset_type = 'tree planting';
DELETE FROM carbon_emissions WHERE id = 100 AND emission_type = 'Industrial'
DELETE FROM carbon_offsets WHERE offset_amount > 500 AND offset_type = 'Renewable Energy'
DELETE FROM Offsets WHERE offset_source = 'Renewable Energy';
DELETE FROM EmissionOffsets WHERE offset_type = 'Renewable Energy' AND offset_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EmissionOffsets WHERE offset_amount > 500.00 AND offset_date < '2022-01-01';
